General.Name: Taiwan Fructose Co Ltd
General.Description: Taiwan Fructose Co., Ltd. manufactures, processes, and trades in starch, maltose, glucose, fructose, and new compound syrup in Taiwan. The company offers fructose products, which is used for soft drinks, juices, tea beverages, sports drinks, and energy drinks; flavored milk, yogurt drinks, and lac fermentum; ice creams, popsicles, and ice cream bars; jellies and puddings; breads and cakes; and soy sauce and health food products. It also provides maltose products for application in candies, iced products, jams, jellies, sachima, bean fillings, chewing gums, peanut candy, and candied fruits; and isomalto-oligosaccharide for use in lactic acid beverages, sports drinks, low fat milk, iced products, candies, jams, and desserts. In addition, the company offers maltodextrine that is used in candies, iced products, biscuits, and desserts, as well as the bakery industry; non-dairy creamers; and sorbitol for use in food, fillings, toothpaste, cleaning and makeup products, and interface activators. Further, it provides dextrose for application in the candy, fillings, beverage, bakery, and candied fruit industries, as well as ultra-high maltose and oil powder. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 265, Nankan Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan, 338019
